title: NBCC to set up shadow lender to help save over $100 mn
description: India's state-run NBCC plans to establish its own NBFC to reduce borrowing costs for infrastructure projects, potentially saving $108 million over two years. The company's board discussed the proposal in March, aiming for approval from the new administration post-elections. NBCC eyes RBI license; past attempts to set up NBFC failed.
